attributes.action: strip Sir Fred Goodwin, former CEO of the Royal Bank of Scotland, of his Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin was Knighted in the Queen's 2004 Birthday Honours list for his services to banking. He has committed a huge disservice to banking, as well as to the UK economy and the lives of millions of people.If the UK honours system is to have any credibilty his honour should be annulled.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
